DESCRIPTION: Sigils are unplayable cards whose effects trigger when they are discarded from your hand.
Activated relics do not have a passive effect.  They have an instant effect when their button is clicked.
At the start of your turn it deals damage to a random enemy.
At the end of your turn gain #yBlock. When receiving unblocked attack damage, reduce Plated Armor by 1.
When played, combines with other resonant cards played that turn and is added to the top of your draw pile next turn.
When a creature with Frostbite attacks it takes damage equal to its Frostbite and reduces Frostbite by 1.
Crushed creatures take more damage from attacks.
Jinxed creatures lose HP when they are debuffed.
Grants 25% extra damage per stack on the first #yAttack each turn.
